text: Main character Tom Witzky, played by Kevin Bacon, begins to experience visions due to being hypnotized by Lisa, his sister-in-law. Samantha is raped and killed and Tom finds her body behind a wall. Frank pulls a gun on Tom and Tom leaves. A murder attempt is put in action against Tom by Harry and Kurt, but Maggie stops it. In the action Maggie is taken hostage, but Frank appears and shoots Harry and Kurt saving Maggie. Finally everything is good and the Witzky's move to their new home. Category:1999 movies
title: Stir of Echoes
